別.definition: to leave; to part (from); (literary) to differentiate; to distinguish; (dialect) to turn away; to turn aside; to avert (one's face, gaze etc); (bound form) other; another; different; don't ...!; to fasten with a pin or clip; to stick in; to insert (in order to hinder movement); (noun suffix) category (as in 性別|性别[xing4 bie2], 派別|派别[pai4 bie2])

別人牽驢你拔橛子.pinyin: bié rén qiān lǘ nǐ bá jué zi
別人牽驢你拔橛子.definition: lit. someone else stole the donkey; you only pulled up the stake it was tethered to (idiom); fig. you're the least culpable, but you're the one who gets the blame

別來無恙.definition: (literary) I trust you have been well since we last met

別具一格.definition: having a unique or distinctive style

別具匠心.definition: to show ingenuity; (of a design) clever; brilliantly conceived

別具隻眼.definition: see 獨具隻眼|独具只眼[du2 ju4 zhi1 yan3]

別出心裁.definition: to hit on sth new (idiom); to display originality; to adopt an original approach

別動隊.definition: special detachment; commando; an armed secret agent squad

別太客氣.definition: lit. no excessive politeness; Don't mention it!; You're welcome!; Please don't stand on ceremony.

別客氣.definition: don't mention it; no formalities, please

別提了.definition: say no more; don't bring it up; drop the subject

別有.definition: to have other...; to have a special ...

別有天地.definition: enchanting scenery; beautiful surroundings; world of its own

別有洞天.definition: place of charm and beauty; scenery of exceptional charm; completely different world

別有韻味.definition: to have quite a lasting charm

別樣.definition: different kind of; another sort of; special; unusual

別樹一幟.definition: lit. to fly one's banner on a solitary tree (idiom); fig. to act as a loner; to stand out; to develop one's own school; to have attitude of one's own

別樹一旗.definition: lit. to fly one's banner on a solitary tree (idiom); fig. to act as a loner; to stand out; to develop one's own school; to have attitude of one's own

別無.definition: to have no other... (used in fixed expressions)

別無他用.definition: to have no other use or purpose (idiom)

別無長物.definition: to possess nothing except bare necessities; to live a poor or frugal life

別理.definition: don't get involved; ignore it!; don't have anything to do with (him, her etc); don't speak to

別看.definition: don't be fooled by the fact that

別致.definition: variant of 別緻|别致[bie2 zhi4]

別苗頭.definition: (dialect) to compete with; to pit oneself against

別說.definition: to say nothing of; not to mention; let alone

別論.definition: a different matter; another story; (old) objection

別赫捷列夫.definition: Vladimir Mikhailovich Bekhterev (1857-1927), Russian neurologist and psychiatrist

別針.definition: pin; safety pin; clip; brooch; CL:枚[mei2]

別開生面.definition: to start sth new or original (idiom); to break a new path; to break fresh ground

別離.definition: to take leave of; to leave; separation
